title: A Misunderstanding
description:
Some days just suck, especially when your Grandma and your cousins take matters into their own hands, and then you have to take these matters away from them, because the family canâ€™t afford to be sued and your House is not made of money.
Timeline:
 A deleted scene from Sapphire Flames, told through Arabella's perspective.
author: Ilona Andrews
